summary:
DECIDED TO CHECK ON MY OLD GAMECUBE
DUG OUT EVERYTHING
IT'S MISSING ATTACHMENTS LIKE THE MEMORY CARDS
BUT IT'S  STILL IN GOOD...
body:
DECIDED TO CHECK ON MY OLD GAMECUBE

DUG OUT EVERYTHING

IT’S MISSING ATTACHMENTS LIKE THE MEMORY CARDS

BUT IT’S STILL IN GOOD CONDITION

NOT PICTURED ARE 2 CONTROLLERS I JUST GAVE TO MY BROTHER

(1 OF THOSE IS A CLEAR CONTROLLER)

ORIGINAL CONTROLLERS

DONKEY KONGA BONGOS

YOOOOOOOOOOO I HAVEN’T LOOKED AT THESE IN LIKE 10 YEARS

blog.name: thevideogameartarchive
blog.title: The Video Game Art Archive
blog.description:
The Video Game Art Archive is dedicated to scanning and extracting classic video game artwork at the best resolutions possible!

Support us on Patreon!
We update four times a day with new artwork from long forgotten games that have never had their art available. Looking for a specific game? Check out the Archive! You might get lucky!
Also follow our other blog: Want to help us continue our work? Help via PayPAL

summary:
Valkyria Chronicles 4 Launch Edition - Nintendo Switch | $19.99 Buy-Now!  
							The part overhead turn-based strategy, part...
caption:
Valkyria Chronicles 4 Launch Edition - Nintendo Switch | $19.99 Buy-Now!

  • The part overhead turn-based strategy, part RPG, and part real-time 3rd person shooter “Blitz” battle system returns to the field.
  • New features include an explosive new class called the Grenadier, numerous offensive/defensive battleship support options, chances for a unit to have a “Last Stand” action before death, and more.
  • The series’ signature hand-drawn visual style is back and overhauled for the newest generation.
  • Inspired by watercolor compositions, the canvas graphics engine blends visual elements of reality and imagination to create an expressive world filled with colorful emotions.
  • The illustrious Hitoshi Sakimoto, original composer of the Valkyria Chronicles series and countless other emotional epics, returns to provide a sweeping orchestral score for the game.

  • New features include an explosive new class called the Grenadier, numerous offensive/defensive battleship support options, chances for a unit to have a “Last Stand” action before death, and more.

summary: (Werbung/Ad) Tach auch, ihr Commando-Brawler! Heute zocken wir für euch Strictly Limited Games neuestes Spiel für PS4 und...
caption: (Werbung/Ad) Tach auch, ihr Commando-Brawler! Heute zocken wir für euch Strictly Limited Games neuestes Spiel für PS4 und Nintendo Switch an: Raging Justice!!! Mit extra Käse! ^^ Danke an Strictly Limited Games, ihr seid wahre Commando-Freunde. :-* Das Game könnt ihr am Sonntag, 31.03. ab 00:00 Uhr (Mitternacht!) bei SLG vorbestellen. Wenn ihr Mitternacht verpennt, gibt es dann noch mal um 18:00 Uhr die Möglichkeit. Achtung: Sommerzeitumstellung!!!: https://ift.tt/2Op1PVB Weitere Infos zum Game gibt’s hier: https://ift.tt/2HK4hG7 Wenn ihr das NESCommando unterstützen wollt, dann klickt gerne (live) mal hier auf unseren Donation-Link https://ift.tt/2J4AiGT Deine Spende - egal in welcher Höhe - unterstützt uns bei unserer Arbeit an unserem Youtube-Kanal (z.B. durch neues Equipment wie Kameras, Mikrofone, Beleuchtungszubehör usw), an unserer Homepage www.nescommando.de und an vielen Projekten, die sonst noch von uns umgesetzt werden wollen (z.B. Neuauflage des NES-Price Guides). Wir stecken viel private Zeit in unsere Projekte und freuen uns natürlich sehr, wenn du das mit einer kleinen Spende supportest. Selbstverständlich ist jede Spende zu 100% freiwillig und wenn du nichts geben magst, bleibt unsere Commando-Power trotzdem immer auf dem höchsten Level! Für den Fall, dass du etwas spendest: Der volle Commando-Dank sei dir gewiss! Die strahlendste Neonpower durchleuchte deine Existenz und schütze dich vor allem Übel, junger Freund! Besucht das Commando im Internet: https://ift.tt/2bc3324 Oder bei Facebook: https://ift.tt/2lkcKk9 Twitter: https://twitter.com/nescommando Insta: https://ift.tt/2znBmSD Holt euch den Price Guide (derzeit ausverkauft) oder EINE TASSE bei uns im Onlineshop: https://ift.tt/2kyeqFP #NESCommando #RagingJustice #StrictlyLimitedGames #PS4 by nescommando

summary: When I made this, I somehow didn't realize I was painting horizontal instead of vertical and it was too late to turn...
caption:
When I made this, I somehow didn’t realize I was painting horizontal instead of vertical and it was too late to turn back..
Designed on Wii U

summary:
My brother found out I still have the Gamecube, controllers, and games we had growing up.
Making the collection easily around...
body:
My brother found out I still have the Gamecube, controllers, and games we had growing up.

Making the collection easily around 16+ years old at this point.

He looks so offended that he had no knowledge of this.

@satan-stole-my-ass
